faqs.question: How long do press-on nails last?
faqs.answer: With proper application using nail glue, our premium press-on nails last 10-14 days. Using adhesive tabs, they last 3-5 days and are perfect for short-term wear. The longevity depends on your daily activities and how well you prep your natural nails before application.

faqs.question: Are press-on nails reusable?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our press-on nails are reusable 2-3 times when applied with adhesive tabs or carefully removed after glue application. After removal, clean off any residue with acetone, store them in the original packaging, and they're ready for your next wear.

faqs.question: Do press-on nails damage natural nails?
faqs.answer: No, when applied and removed correctly, press-on nails don't damage your natural nails. Unlike acrylics or gel extensions that require filing and harsh chemicals, press-ons sit on top of your natural nail with gentle adhesive. Always prep properly and remove carefully for healthy nails.

faqs.question: What's included in each press-on nail set?
faqs.answer: Each set includes 24-30 nails in various sizes (enough for 2-3 applications), professional-grade nail glue or adhesive tabs, an alcohol prep pad, a mini nail file for shaping, and a cuticle stick. Everything you need for salon-quality nails at home in one complete package.

faqs.question: How do I apply press-on nails for best results?
faqs.answer: For long-lasting wear: 1) Push back cuticles and buff nail surface, 2) Clean nails with alcohol pad, 3) Select correct nail size for each finger, 4) Apply thin layer of glue to natural nail and press-on, 5) Press firmly for 30 seconds. Avoid water for 2 hours after application for maximum bond strength.
